title: BBQ pork shoulder
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons chopped garlic', '80g chopped onion', '1 dash soy sauce', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '2 tablespoons apple juice', '3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon black treacle', '4 tablespoons wine', '4 tablespoons Italian salad dressing', '125ml distilled malt vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1/4 teaspoon seasoning salt', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 (3.6kg) whole pork shoulder joint']
